title: Get Apple’s full-sized Magic Keyboard for its lowest price in months
content:
Macworld

The best keyboard you can possibly get to go along with your Mac setup is the Apple Magic Keyboard, and luckily for you, it’s now on sale at Amazon for the best price we’ve seen in months. Now down to $176, you can save 12 percent off its $199 MSRP, a nice price for an excellent keyboard that rarely goes on sale.

This full keyboard features not only the numeric pad but also Touch ID, so you can just use your fingerprint to unlock the computer. Since this one features a rechargeable internal battery, it means you won’t ever need to worry about replacing batteries – one less thing to worry about. You’ll just have to use a Lightning cable to bring it back to 100 percent but since the battery lasts about a month or more, you won’t have to do that too often.

The Magic Keyboard connects to your Mac wirelessly via Bluetooth. When you’re not using it, you can flip the switch on the back of the keyboard so you’re not wasting away the battery.

So take advantage of this deal and get the Apple Magic Keyboard for $176 at Amazon since we can’t know when we’re going to see a discount again.
